website_summaries.verdict: The ability to take an notable number of eye-catching games on the road makes the Vita the perfect mobile companion to the PlayStation 4, and although it may be on the way out, this is the perfect opportunity to experience its entire backlog of top-tier portable titles.
pros: Over 9,000 games are playable on the PlayStation Vita
Plays certain PS4 games via Remote Play
cons: The Vita is fairly pricey, and while Sony’s handheld ceased production in March, 2019, developers continue to release new games for it

customer_reviews.title: Vita PCH-2000
customer_reviews.text: Note: Purchased from Above All Games. YMMV with other sellers. For those concerned about what exactly they might be getting: I received a brand new North America PCH-2000 on 3.55 firmware, exactly as described in the listing. So far everything is working perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: TJP

customer_reviews.title: BUYER BEWARE THIS PRODUCT WAS NOT NEW! All new ...
customer_reviews.text: BUYER BEWARE THIS PRODUCT WAS NOT NEW! All new Vita systems (expect the Blue and Red Japanese models) will have a firmware version of 3.60 or less. The one I was shipped has 3.65, which proves that at least the motherboard was previously used. New Vita systems are particularly valuable and now somewhat rare, so this is a common scam.
customer_reviews.author: Graham

customer_reviews.title: But they're great games and you have a great handful of psp ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm loving it so much. Thought I'd regret it after a while since I have a 3ds but it's more of the opposite. Some people say there aren't that many vita games and i can see what they mean by that. But they're great games and you have a great handful of psp and ps2 games you can download and I'm loving it.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel Rivera

customer_reviews.title: REALLY!?!?
customer_reviews.text: Would have given a 0 if I could, seal on the box looked liked it had been opened and closed back again, and effectively...that was the case....inside was a PSP slim instead of the Vita...atleast the had the decency of including the actual PSP charger........
customer_reviews.author: R.Carlos

customer_reviews.title: It really is a good system and worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I own an Xbox one and I wanted to play some rpg's but xbox doesn't really have any good ones. So I bought the Vita to play all my FF games and mega man games and this console is cool. Man I love the Vita, Idk why it didn't sell well, cause its pretty awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Raymond Asencion Musgrove

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied Customer
customer_reviews.text: Got my PSVita yesterday from All Above Games brand new out of the box. It came right on time for me with no delays. I was skeptical on ordering it from Amazon but after reading the reviews I decided to give it a shot. I wanted to be able to play The Sims 4 while I'm away at work & I can't wait to try it out this week. Definitely worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great portable console!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. Got the new slim 2000 and I love it so far. So many jrpgs! I think I'm going to enjoy this a lot more than the 3DS. And it's great that it connects with your ps account and trophies. Very sturdy and sleek . Just wish the home screen was more customizable bc it looks a little childish with the 3d bubble appearance.
customer_reviews.author: SDG Kofei

customer_reviews.title: PS4, BETTER ON THE VITA!?
customer_reviews.text: the screen has some image burns, and the brightness is a bit low, but the fact that it plays ps4 seamlessly is amazing! it makes up for all the short comings of the ps vita. i even recorded both screens at the same time with a high speed 120fps camera and noticed that the vita has a 2 millisecond less of a delay then my 4k tv (because the tv does alot of processing and up-scaling) so it runs smoother if only by a little bit.
customer_reviews.author: HappySquidMusic YT

customer_reviews.title: Could've been good if not for the proprietary memory constantly corrupting
customer_reviews.text: The only good game on this system is Persona 4 Golden. P4G might be good enough to justify the price by itself if not for the proprietary SD cards being overpriced and terrible quality. My SD card has corrupted 3 times and I haven't even been able to finish Persona 4 Golden despite owning the system for almost 5 years because every time I come back to it, my data is corrupted. Honestly wish I could just refund the system and memory card because Sony's support doesn't acknowledge the Vita's existence anymore and won't do anything about deleting my 60 hour save.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Broderick

customer_reviews.title: henkaku yes
customer_reviews.text: got this from above all games and it came brand new and with 3.55 soooo yay
customer_reviews.author: austin

customer_reviews.title: Still a good console.
customer_reviews.text: Got this over a 3DS/2DS on July. 2017. I got it for the types of games I wanted to play. The Nintendo offering is just as good a console, but it didn't have the type of games I wanted to play. Im definitely Having fun with mine. Fantastic interface with buttons and sticks, touch screens front and back, tilt sensors and cameras. It allows developers to get creative with game play. My only gripe with this console are the expensive and proprietary memory cards Sony requires you to buy. Build is very solid and my gaming with just the on board battery lasted me about 5 hours. I recommend getting a grip accessory.
customer_reviews.author: L11

customer_reviews.title: Ambitious engineering hindered by a limited game market
customer_reviews.text: No longer will you have to choose between pooping and playing PS4- thanks to PS Vita. This however is about the best use you'll ever get out of this "mobile" gaming experience. The Vita exclusive game market can be described as lackluster at best and it's only saving grace is the "second screen" feature that allows your Vita to effectively piggyback off the established power of your PS4 with some noticable lag (depending on your wifi connection). In all, it's fun but not for anything over $100.
customer_reviews.author: Max V.

customer_reviews.title: PS Vita WiFi is very nice...
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this Sony PS Vita WiFi for my adult son. In the past he's had about 2 - 3 of them but did not keep them. He loves PS products and wish he never gotten rid of his Vitas in the past. He loves it and vow to keep this one. He highly recommends anything PlayStation to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Tonia Randolph

customer_reviews.title: The actual model is the original P.S. Vita with the 3G option, and not the wifi-only P.S. Vita.
customer_reviews.text: The item was delivered in excellent condition, however the item in the picture was not the P.S. Vita model delivered, rather it was the older model. There could've been a possibility that I rushed this order without reading the description of the item, rather I just looked at the picture and thought I would receive that particular model. To be honest though, I am satisfied with the item that was delivered, being that it was a P.S. Vita, and have no complaints. So just 4 stars because of the picture. Anyway, thank you for the item.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It Doesn’t Work Properly
customer_reviews.text: The only reason I am giving this product any stars is because it arrived insanely fast and I got the item I asked for. The BIGGEST problem I have is that the buttons don’t work on anything other than the main menu. I understand that this is a somewhat common problem with the Vita console, but it would have been nice to know that before ordering. Also it would have been nice had the Vita been tested before shipment so this problem could have been fixed. Now I have to take it to get fixed, fix it myself, or return it. I’m glad it came with a charger cable, but it would love for it to work properly.
customer_reviews.author: Seth Randles

customer_reviews.title: i love the remote play feature
customer_reviews.text: Wow this is a powerful little video game machine. Lightweight and excellent battery life. And with remote play, i can play games on my vita that are on my playstation 4 at home while i am at a friend's house.
customer_reviews.author: Wallplate City

customer_reviews.title: Still a great buy even in 2016
customer_reviews.text: Good system feels sturdy and looks good, it is light and the buttons feel good. Their are still games being released for it mainly Japanese imports but the system already has a good library that you can play. The battery life is good and the sound quality from the speakers is good for what it is. though I mainly play Jrpg's and Rhythm games such as Project Diva f 2nd. I am very happy with my purchase even if people like to hate on the system.
customer_reviews.author: Chavez

customer_reviews.title: Bad price... just get it new...
customer_reviews.text: Should've paid less... screen has small crack bottom left, back all scratched up, and really felt defeated. I know it was refurbished but not that bad. It's still better then the one I broke but should've bought it new with this price.
customer_reviews.author: William Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Grrrrrrrreeaaat!!!!!!!! Outstanding!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Has an amazing matte finish to it. Just outstanding! The joysticks moves really smooth as well and everything just feels perfect, the device is light and glossy on front. Not only that! But the battery last me almost a whole day! If I were to play nonstop, then it'll probably last around 6-7 hours on a full charge.. (Full charge last about 2-2 1/2 hrs) Recommend Tempered Glass Protector on the Front Screen, but no need on the back. Runs very Smooth!
customer_reviews.author: Steven Duong

customer_reviews.title: My son loves his Playstation Vita
customer_reviews.text: This was exactly as described. It came new in the box. I had a hard time finding this as it is no longer sold in stores but my son wanted it for Christmas last year so I took a chance and ordered it online. I researched sellers before making the purchase and was very happy with them (Above all Games). We received the item on time and everything was as stated. It has been almost a year since the purchase and everything still works great. My son has played with this Playstation Vita on a daily basis since Christmas 2018.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: Excellent console, brand new in box, version 3.55
customer_reviews.text: The console is great, high quality, great performance and battery life. I purchased from the seller "Above All Games" and received PCH-2001 with software version 3.55.
customer_reviews.author: Steel

customer_reviews.title: Poor condition
customer_reviews.text: Firstly I’m very disappointed. This was advertised to be a PS Vita Slim and I got the original PS Vita Secondly they said it was in good condition and no scratches. Was very clearly damaged and dirty(see pictures above) Probably will be returning and not buying from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Ohhkamii

customer_reviews.title: I like it, it's light
customer_reviews.text: I like it, it's light, the display is nice like a smartphone, remote access to my PS4 works wonderfully, I'm waiting for my 64 Gb memory card. The worst of this device is the camera quality, both cameras suck, but hey, it could have no cameras at all, so, all in all that's fine. The speakers don't sound as good as I had hoped for. If you use a headset it will sound much better. I'm having trouble getting used to the triggers, I find them too shaky. Overall I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: LoreG

customer_reviews.title: 3.55 firmware from Above All Games as "new" and %100 condition
customer_reviews.text: Just received a "new" conditioned PS Vita (Black Slim PCH-2001 NA model) on June 2, 2018 from Above All Games and had firmware 3.55 out of box!!! I received the product as if it were sold in stores when the PS Vita originally was released (Box, manuals, cords, no damage, etc). Built in 1GB memory in my system and was not supposed to have an external memory card shipping with it.
customer_reviews.author: Brennan

customer_reviews.title: Great console for your buck
customer_reviews.text: The best! Sweet console. Great for in bed gaming before you go to sleep, long waits at the dmv, travelling, etc. It's a lot lighter (weight) than my psp. Graphics are awesome and I doubt anyone can readily tell the difference from the 1st version. The price was also phenomenal. Games are relatively easy to come by. I haven't tried the online feature yet, but plan to do so soon enough. By far, this is the best portable console on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby E.

customer_reviews.title: Great deal!
customer_reviews.text: I got a Vita used for $121 and was told it will be in acceptable quality/moderate wear. I was thinking “Ok, I plan on giving it a paint job, so I can just cover up the worn paint.” To my surprise, the Vita was almost in mint condition! There was not a single scratch, save for a tiny one in the bottom right corner. The only “moderate wear”, I saw, was dried chunks of sweat caught in the crevices, yuck! Nothing a little taking apart, cleaning, and putting it back together couldn’t solve!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: came with both analog joysticks drifting
customer_reviews.text: worked well right up till I actually tried to play a game with either of the analog joysticks. Is obvious that any testing done on the unit had nothing to do with them. Serious drift from both first time playing making any game that uses the joysticks at all unplayable
customer_reviews.author: Brad Bubolz

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Psvita is amazing. Must get before they sell out again!
customer_reviews.author: Miguel Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: This was purchased for my brother while he was in ...
customer_reviews.text: This was purchased for my brother while he was in hospital to help keep him occupied. While it was more expensive than other products out there, we went with this since it had Prime shipping, so we knew it would arrive quickly. My brother was thrilled with it (his previous one had broken) and it helped him to get through some tough times.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Japanese not U.S
customer_reviews.text: Product does not say its a Japanese version. Box arrived new but the condition of the seal makes me think it was resealed. I am returning this item due to receiving a Japanese version when expecting a U.S version very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing system
customer_reviews.text: First Sony handheld I've had and after using this system for a few months i can definitely say that it is my favorite handheld ever and I've had ever Nintendo handheld since the Gameboy. It's really too bad that it's sales didn't meet Sony's expectations because it's a great system. Thankfully third party support is strong thanks to a dedicated fan base and the system is home to all kinds of great games, especially if you like RPGs.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Amazing item. I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I've had it for a few days now and I can tell you this is one awesome product. I enjoy playing it so much but I definitely recommend getting a PlayStation SD card because it only comes with 1gb of memory. It's enough to save a few game files but getting even a 8gb one is ideal. It got to my house almost the same day but their was a small issue with the delivery but nothing horrible. In the end I'm happy I purchased this item.
customer_reviews.author: Abel Lares

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect condition!
customer_reviews.text: The unit I received is in almost perfect condition. Just a few scuff marks on the back. All the buttons and features function like new. It came bubble wrapped with a PS Vita charger. There was a nice card in there thanking you for the purchase and contact details if you have any needs. I ordered it on Wednesday and it arrived Friday afternoon. I bought my PS Vita mainly to play PS1 classics. If you have been wanting a Vita, this is a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Got an import model, I think?
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this a long time ago, and my O/X buttons are mixed around on the dashboard, like I can press X and it goes back, and I can press I and it selects whatever's highlighted. I love the Vita system, it works fine, but I think I'd gotten an imported model due to the switched X/O buttons.
customer_reviews.author: Zane Gorden

customer_reviews.title: Unit has defects
customer_reviews.text: Description pretty accurate. Minor scratches on screen. Sides of unit dinged up. The reason for the 1 star is because the unit was not technician tested. Neither joystick work and get stuck going one direction. Should have been a basic thing to check. Thankfully replacement one are only $5. **Edit: Was going to be 1 star, but found out joystick issues can be caused by dust. Was able to fix with compress air. 3 stars cause they didnt check it and do basic maitenance. Works fine otherwise
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Harris

customer_reviews.title: Great For Japanese / PS1 / PS2 Games
customer_reviews.text: A plethora of Japanese games and PS1/PS2 games keeps this library robust and never ending. It's insanity how nice the handheld is out the box and is my current favorite console. Only downside is getting the memory card but after that it's nothing but pluses.
customer_reviews.author: Vahn Awakens The Genesis Tree

customer_reviews.title: Vita is a great system.
customer_reviews.text: wish it was the fat vita but i'm okay with this. Love the Vita lot of great games for the system and I spend a lot of time on it at work when i have nothing to do.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon

customer_reviews.title: No control
customer_reviews.text: I have No control with this PS vita could I have a Exchange for a better one?, this example Shows Mortal Kombat 9 being played and I am unable to choose a character because of how the system itself is.
customer_reviews.author: DeMarco Adkins

customer_reviews.title: As expected for used
customer_reviews.text: One of the joysticks has a little catch in it so it can be frustrating with some games but for a "like new" vita all other aspects of it were in great condition.
customer_reviews.author: Grant Worcester

customer_reviews.title: Ps Vita
customer_reviews.text: Pros: The vita works fine and looks amazing. Cons: The Vita came with no carry case or Memory Card. Overall: Regardless of the cons I truly enjoyed my purchase. I thank you & wish you An amazing new year
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very bad do not buy
customer_reviews.text: The description said that it was acceptable it was not acceptable the charging cord is frayed for 1 everything was beat up including the screen there is a line down the middle and there is pixel figuration very very very bad
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Ragone

customer_reviews.title: OTG Gaming doesn't get better.
customer_reviews.text: Really love my Vita. Shipped with 3.60 Firmware and works wonderfully. Just the thing for on the go gaming and the battery has been a pleasant surprise. Shame this system never really took off in the West, but there is plenty of content old and upcoming to keep it relevant.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Love!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely Wonderful! I ordered one yesterday and got it today. Just as described. Works really well! I’m so happy with my purchase. :)
customer_reviews.author: Chiyo-chan

customer_reviews.title: Living la Vita Loca
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Vita months ago and have thoroughly enjoyed grabbing this Sony handheld. It did not receive nearly the attention it deserved. Though used, I have had no issues with it and have jumped on great games like Persona 4 Golden, Freedom Wars, and the Final Fantasy X/X-2 Remaster. And I'm just getting started. 5/5 would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Unlucky_Thir13en

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Worked great. Had got a used one on here and it didnt work so got a new one. No regrets.
customer_reviews.author: Audra Burke

customer_reviews.title: I love my Vita
customer_reviews.text: One of the best consoles ever made . If you are a gamer or even not this is a great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Sony Playstation Vita is super fun...albeit if you're into mostly third party games!
customer_reviews.text: Product delivered in a timely manner and no damage to package. Sony Playstation Vita is still a super fun portable device, even though it did not receive a ton of first party games! I still play it currently in 2019. One of the best features is the "remote play"-lets you play your PS4 games on this device if you have a robust wi-fi connection...can play the games either in another room in house or in another city or state, even! Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: CPTMarvelComix

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice~
customer_reviews.text: Super thin, I love that all the buttons are circles and not ovals, just very eye pleasing. It is super durable. Shipped quickly and arrived very fast.
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: Received new PS Vita from GFMEDIA: it is Japanese ...
customer_reviews.text: Received new PS Vita from GFMEDIA: it is Japanese version PCH-2006 with firmware 3.61. Can't return it because I don't live in USA. Select another seller for USA version.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad drift issue
customer_reviews.text: I was pretty prepared for this when I bought the PS Vita in 2020 that i was gonna have to do repairs of my own and honestly all in all the system is in good condition but the drift issue on the joysticks makes any game unplayable, I can fix it but as it was advertised as "good condition with very minor cosmetic issues is pretty misleading
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a great upgrade to the original
customer_reviews.text: This is a great upgrade to the original, Although I do miss the OLED screen, the extra ram really improves the remote play options 5 Stars!!
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Mota

customer_reviews.title: Battery died in less than 1 year.
customer_reviews.text: This seemed like a good product. However, less than a year later it won't hold more than one bar of charge. 20 min. of play for hours of charging.
customer_reviews.author: Jmom234

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Got this for Father’s Day and works great months later. Dad loves this, he’s a gamer at heart, may not be the best but he’s happy and addicted to it on business trips
customer_reviews.author: BOB

customer_reviews.title: Great device
customer_reviews.text: Great handheld device. Many great games available for purchase online if you have the space to download the game. Not a fan of the storage cards, but I bought used and it came with one.
customer_reviews.author: wumbla

customer_reviews.title: If you're going to download games check the cost of the memory cards.
customer_reviews.text: Just had to buy a very over priced memory card for this. I don't like having to spend extra money because they want to gouge people with proprietary nonsense.
customer_reviews.author: Misco

customer_reviews.title: 3.55 brand new from Above all games
customer_reviews.text: Very happy to find this one, brand new, flawless and 3.55! Thanks to Above all games, and they answer if you write them with a question.
customer_reviews.author: Liquid

customer_reviews.title: good device and a little (surface) different from the last year's vita slim
customer_reviews.text: Just ordered the PS Vita last week. This is my second ps vita, with my first one (also PCH-2001, the vita slim) bought earlier this year from Japan but bricked. Warning: PS vita bought abroad will not be covered by SCE America, even you are willing to pay for the repair. The new vita feels slightly different from my old one -- the backside surface is matt (other than the back touchpad area), which feels definitely nicer than the old vita slim. No regret whatsoever in buying the new one.
customer_reviews.author: LP

customer_reviews.title: One of the best gaming systems I have bought
customer_reviews.text: One of the best gaming systems I have bought. You can do so much besides playing games on it, like connecting to the internet and playing music. The screen resolution is fantastic with a clear large screen. My son has played with this unit and not once found anything wrong with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than using a cell phone for games.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Wish I had gotten one earlier. Screen is bright, the graphics are awesome, and the sound is great from the built in speakers. The titles are ones I can play over and over. I can download titles. The functionality to use with my PS3 is a bonus. Too bad its life cycle got cut short.
customer_reviews.author: csaferret

customer_reviews.title: Wish they didn't discontinue but getting lot of use out of it
customer_reviews.text: Brand new can't beat price. Use it almost everyday still no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Great System, OK Price
customer_reviews.text: Quick shipping, item arrived in new condition. Purchased from Above All Games running v.3.55 firmware. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Mike K.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Got it mid June 2017 from seller "Above All Games", came next day prime, USA console with 3.55 firmware on it. Just as expected, unlike those other sellers sending over Japanese consoles.
customer_reviews.author: Duxa

customer_reviews.title: Fake description
customer_reviews.text: I’m aware that the item wasn’t brand new however the description did not match the product at all aw the device was filled with scratches. This device seemed very very old. It was described to have few scratches
customer_reviews.author: Marisa F.

customer_reviews.title: Love the Vita
customer_reviews.text: Product came on time as described and undamaged. I love this console as i like a lot of J-RPGs and visual novels and would recommend it to anyone else who likes those types of games as well.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: you don't wanna rough this thing around like a 3DS
customer_reviews.text: Its abit delicate, you don't wanna rough this thing around like a 3DS. Its a bit like a sports car of portable gaming systems where the 3DS is like a truck. the Vita is delicate but its also very fast and very awesome....don't underestimate its potential. Unlocking it is kind of a trick for someone like me who hasn't done anything with play stations in ten years.
customer_reviews.author: Angie

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: It came much earlier than expected, by almost a week. Everything works fine, screen is in great condition (I believed this was replaced). There are a few minor scratches on the back, but it is used and was expected.
customer_reviews.author: Very good!!

customer_reviews.title: Not good for streaming to ps4
customer_reviews.text: Got to connect to my ps4 pro but wouldnt stay connected.. Eventually returned
customer_reviews.author: reynaldo

customer_reviews.title: Great product for those interested it came with firmware 3
customer_reviews.text: Bought from Key2West Marketing. Great product for those interested it came with firmware 3.55.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working same day
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband. When he got it yesterday morning it was great. Then last night the touch screen became unresponsive and won’t do anything.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Not warehouse deals
customer_reviews.text: Ordered through Amazon warehouse deals, still had the prior psn account on it and it would not allow me to log into my own psn, highly dissatisfied. Returned
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived very quickly. Item in perfect condition. No issues at all. Item works perfectly. I was surprised that it didn't have a memory card, perhaps it says that in the description and I missed it. But no memory card but everything else is fine. And I will definitely need a protective case for this product.
customer_reviews.author: Candace

customer_reviews.title: Product sucks
customer_reviews.text: This was definitely the worst thing I have bought off of Amazon. No box, no instructions. The charger that came with it was for like an old iPhone or something. The screen is scratched to hell.
customer_reviews.author: Troy Bondurant

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Item just as described, was a bit pricey but worth every penny to see a smile on my son face , had so many to choose from and this seller is true and honest
customer_reviews.author: Adella

customer_reviews.title: Still running strong
customer_reviews.text: I bought this over 2 years ago I believe and after several (SEVERAL) drops its still running strong. I don't use it much now days but Its still there whenever I need to. Great product that was brand new. Im very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Diablous DVonte

customer_reviews.title: My fiancee loves it
customer_reviews.text: Came securely packaged. I got this for my fiancee to take along with him to help pass time between deliveries. He instead plays this quite often during his down time. I'd say it's a win gift.
customer_reviews.author: Melody N.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SYSTEM for MY 5 year old Grandson
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 5 year old grandson who loves it! His favorite games are all of the Lego adventures. Several are a little difficult for him, but he has no trouble with the controls of the PS Vita game itself.
customer_reviews.author: PT

customer_reviews.title: Bought this just to play my PS4 games via remote ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this just to play my PS4 games via remote access. It's laggy as heck even if you are at home. Returned it the next day.
customer_reviews.author: Oz

customer_reviews.title: ... play my ps4 pro in bed and it works excellent for that
customer_reviews.text: I use this mainly to remotely play my ps4 pro in bed and it works excellent for that. Also not bad for watching Netflix but the app is pretty slow.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Saulf

customer_reviews.title: Buggy left stick
customer_reviews.text: After buying 3 separate vitas from amazon all three of them have had their left stick start acting randomly within 3 weeks. I'm aware 2nd gen vitas have a problem with this in general but it seems to be even more pervasive than normal. I wouldn't suggest getting one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite handheld
customer_reviews.text: The vita is underated. It is easily my favorite handheld, has a great battery life, a very nice screen (thought the older models have an even better OLED screen), and uses game carts. Pick one up and help support this awesome machine!
customer_reviews.author: Jake Harman

customer_reviews.title: Love this little thing
customer_reviews.text: Love this little thing! I love how easy it is to use and I also use it for netflix and hulu and the streaming quality is really really smooth and great!
customer_reviews.author: Skylar Hunt, esq

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: absolutely love this purchase. I bought used, but it seems brand new. very happy with the seller.
customer_reviews.author: richard

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't recommend
customer_reviews.text: Given for a Christmas gift...screen is so small it is not enjoyable to play
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Sony product.
customer_reviews.text: Worth the cost. Especially since they will stop being made soon.
customer_reviews.author: Brock Ebbing

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Must have for remote play, at least till/if they add LTE support to mobile app.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: I would highly recommend this seller
customer_reviews.text: Ordered from Above All Games. The device was actually new and not a return. System firmware was 3.55, I would highly recommend this seller!
customer_reviews.author: Sam K

customer_reviews.title: Order it without hesitation!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just recieved the PS Vita a few days ago (I am from Kuwait), and the shipment came fast. The console is brand new without a scratch.(it is on the old verion, I had to update the software, that proves it is new and not touched). As described and I totally satisfied with the product. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Omar Al Faji

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Looks great works great but weres the vita box it only came in a regular box and the price of it is to high it needs to go down in price otherwise great
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Porter

customer_reviews.title: Love it, bought from a seller who says it ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it, bought from a seller who says it was "Like new" and its great. The outer box was a little dirty and ripped on top but the inner box was flawless and so is the Vita. Fun and easy to use, I love the mini game cases, the indie games are fun and interesting, and I adore the Remote Play. Glad to have it.
customer_reviews.author: Tristan J. Arguijo

customer_reviews.title: LIKE NEW 😁!
customer_reviews.text: Your right like you said "MINT"!... Thanx just setting up the PSV S for a Christmas surprise & downloading all that these memory cards can handle thanx again guys! Hope all you guys have a Merry Christmas and a happy New Year 2019!!! Cheers
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only for Playstation Vita fans!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this brand new Playstation Vita, great quality!
customer_reviews.author: Fernando Corrales Mora

customer_reviews.title: Wish I had bought one sooner. Also wish it ...
customer_reviews.text: Wish I had bought one sooner. Also wish it didn't have certain quirks. Memory expansion is ridiculously over-priced. Obviously shows its age, and was not improved as much as the new 3ds improves nintendo's line.
customer_reviews.author: Sivant

customer_reviews.title: My vita had flaws
customer_reviews.text: I bought this vita from (GAGF) for 118 bucks, and on the back of the console, rear touchpad, there are little scratches, and it looks like there is some kind of screen damage on the touchscreen, also the battery life is very short. Sometimes I can’t use the touch screen on the home screen because it locks up if I stay on the homescreen too long
customer_reviews.author: Brenden Johnson

customer_reviews.title: No charger, no memory card
customer_reviews.text: Depending on which buyer you go through with, a charger and memory card will not be offered, and you can't play without those. Though, the vita does look good, and, despite not being able to play yet, it is pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Jakofalltrades

customer_reviews.title: just perfect when traveling and need something to do besides look ...
customer_reviews.text: just perfect when traveling and need something to do besides look out the car window while others are driving.
customer_reviews.author: Joanie

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful!! Came on time and in good condition and The ps vita itself is great, I have been having so much fun playing it Totally worth all the money! 😊 DONT FORGET TO GET A GAME AND A MEMORY CARD with this!
customer_reviews.author: anya

customer_reviews.title: Purchased this for my daughter for her 16th birthday and ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my daughter for her 16th birthday and she loves it. Not only can she play the vita games she can also play games from our PS4 console.
customer_reviews.author: shelly

customer_reviews.title: No Memory Card
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is great. It's a nice sleek design, it's light, portable, but the only problem (and why I'm marking it down one star) is that it does NOT include a memory card. Be sure to buy one with your purchase of the console!
customer_reviews.author: Mana

customer_reviews.title: Sony PlayStation Vita Wi-Fi
customer_reviews.text: It is very light and has a very low battery drain in stand by mode. The touch screen is not as responsive to stylus as that of the series 1000 (AMOLED) PS Vita, otherwise it's crisp and responsive to button commands.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a really nice handheld to have with a great library of games
customer_reviews.text: Underrated console. It's a really nice handheld to have with a great library of games.
customer_reviews.author: Wil

product_meta.title: Sony PlayStation Vita WiFi
product_meta.description: Take the greatness of PlayStation on the go with the Ultimate Gamer's Companion. On the PlayStation Vita system, gamers can play over 1,000 PlayStation games, stream PS4 games via Remote Play, and stream PS3games via PS Now. This slim and sleek device also features a more immersive gaming experience away from your console and TV.
feature_bullets: Over 1000 Games: Many PlayStation Vita games, such as Final Fantasy X, God of War Collection, and Minecraft, classic games from PS One and PSP systems and more
Remote Play: Stream a wide range of your PS4 games on your PS Vita system over a local wi-fi network when away from your PS4 system or TV

PlayStation Now: Play over 150 PS3 games directly on your PS Vita system with PlayStationNow Game Streaming. (Service not available in all areas. A steady broadband connection greater than 5Mbps hardwired is HIGHLY recommended)
Entertainment and Apps: Search funny videos, check your friend's status, watch your favorite TV shows and movies, stream music, and much much more on the PS Vita system
Designed for Superior Gameplay: The slim, sleek, and light design of the PS Vita makes it comfortable to hold and the dual analog controls provide a deeply immersive gameplay experience
